epi-report.c

00001 /**********************************************
00002  * epi-report.c                               *
00003  *                                            *
00004  * Writes percent of agents (by CT) who are   *
00005  *   Susceptible, Incubating, Symptomatic,    *
00006  *   Recovered, Dead.                         *
00007  *                                            *
00008  * Columns:                                   *
00009  *   Day                                      *
00010  *   CT                                       *
00011  *   Percent Susceptible                      *
00012  *   Percent Incubating                       *
00013  *   Percent Symptomatic                      *
00014  *   Percent Recovered                        *
00015  *   Percent Deceased                         *
00016  *   Total Agents in CT                       *
00017  *   Agents Susceptible                       *
00018  *   Agents Exposed (Incubating)              *
00019  *   Agents Infected (Symptomatic)            *
00020  *   Agents Recovered                         *
00021  *   Agents Dead                              *
00022  **********************************************/
00023 
00024 #include <epi.h>
00025 
00026 // 5/17/2007 ERB added a CT total to report
00027 
00028 void
00029 epi_report_census_tract()
00030 {
00031         int i,j;
00032         int total;
00033 
00034         g_epi_complete = 1;
00035 
00036         for(i = 0; i < g_epi_nct; i++)
00037         {
00038                 total = 0;
00039                 for (j = 0; j <= g_epi_nstages; j++)
00040                 {
00041                         total += g_epi_ct[i][j];
00042                 }
00043 
00044                 if(0 == total)
00045                         continue;
00046 
00047                 fprintf(g_epi_log_f, "%d %d", g_epi_day, i);
00048 
00049                 for(j = 0; j <= g_epi_nstages; j++)
00050                 {
00051                         fprintf(g_epi_log_f, " %d", (100*g_epi_ct[i][j])/total);
00052                 }
00053 
00054                 fprintf(g_epi_log_f," %d", total);
00055 
00056                 for(j = 0; j <= g_epi_nstages; j++)
00057                 {
00058                         fprintf(g_epi_log_f, " %d", g_epi_ct[i][j]);
00059                 }
00060 
00061                 fprintf(g_epi_log_f, "\n");
00062 
00063                 if(g_epi_ct[i][1] || g_epi_ct[i][2])
00064                         g_epi_complete = 0;
00065         }
00066 
00067         fprintf(g_epi_hospital_f, "%d %u\n", g_epi_day, g_epi_hospital);
00068         g_epi_hospital = 0;
00069 
00070         fflush(NULL);
00071         fsync(fileno(g_epi_log_f));
00072         fsync(fileno(g_epi_hospital_f));
00073 }
